channel.title: What's Wrong With This Code Snipplet
channel.description:
[b]This is after attempting to add a shop..[/b]
[b]I've already added this into shop.cfg[/b] shop = 44 whip_store 1 1 4151 150430 [b]and added this into autspawn.cfg[/b] 1699 3101 3505 0 0 0 0 0 1 whip [b] I also added this into client.java[/b]
else if (NPCID == 1699) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 44; }
After trying to compile this is what comes up in the compiler:
------------------------------- Files Being Compiled. . . -------------------------------- client.java:11410: cannot find symbol symbol : Variable PutNPCCords location: class client PutNPCCords = true; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue. . .

item.title: What's Wrong With This Code Snipplet
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:6, topic:283506”]You’re sure it’s a typo? In the compiler, right click > Mark > Highlight > Click > Paste here.

Otherwise, declare

boolean PutNPCCoords = false;

Lol? you know there is a simpler way to do it?

right click > select all > hit enter > paste here…

Read full topic
item.source: What's Wrong With This Code Snipplet

item.title: What's Wrong With This Code Snipplet
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You used a space instead of a tab somewhere in the .cfg file. You need to use tabs, NOT spaces.

Read full topic
item.source: What's Wrong With This Code Snipplet

item.title: What's Wrong With This Code Snipplet
item.dc:creator: @jam_on_toast jam on toast
item.description:
@jam_on_toast wrote:

wow I get what you mean rofl, sorry i’m new
thanks heaps.
i now get this though,
Dragon-History is Online.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "
1504303"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:449)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499)
at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:88)
at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:33)
at server.main(server.java:130)
Connection from localhost:2010
[client-1-Brendan]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 15 ms]
Connection from localhost:2011
[client-2-Brendan]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms]
Connection from localhost:2013
[client-3-Brendan]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms]
and it wont let me log-in ( black screen then dc, repeats. )

Read full topic
item.source: What's Wrong With This Code Snipplet

item.title: What's Wrong With This Code Snipplet
item.dc:creator: @pelow pelow_
item.description:
@pelow wrote:

That’s not a typo.

Add another O. That’s why it’s not being recognized.

Read full topic

item.title: What's Wrong With This Code Snipplet
item.dc:creator: @jam_on_toast jam on toast
item.description:
@jam_on_toast wrote:

This is after attempting to add a shop…

I’ve already added this into shop.cfg
shop = 44 whip_store 1 1 4151 150430
and added this into autspawn.cfg
1699 3101 3505 0 0 0 0 0 1 whip
I also added this into client.java

else if (NPCID == 1699) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 44;
}

After trying to compile this is what comes up in the compiler:

Files Being Compiled. . .

client.java:11410: cannot find symbol
symbol : Variable PutNPCCords
location: class client
PutNPCCords = true;
^
1 error
Press any key to continue. . .

Read full topic
